name: The Adaptive Chef - Evaluation Suite
description: Comprehensive test cases for meal planning agent functionality

test_cases.name: Dietary Preferences Setup
test_cases.description: Test ability to capture and store dietary restrictions
test_cases.input: I'm vegan and allergic to peanuts. I also don't like mushrooms.

test_cases.name: Pantry Management - Add Items
test_cases.input: Add rice, black beans, tomatoes, spinach, and olive oil to my pantry
expected_behavior: Uses pantry tool to add items

test_cases.name: Simple Meal Plan Generation
test_cases.description: Test basic meal plan creation with constraints
test_cases.input: Create a 2-day vegan meal plan using items from my pantry. Keep it simple and healthy.
expected_behavior: Includes breakfast, lunch, dinner for each day
Provides recipes with ingredients and instructions

test_cases.name: Complex Meal Plan with Multiple Constraints
test_cases.description: Test meal planning with multiple constraints and preferences
test_cases.input: Generate a 3-day meal plan. I want high-protein vegan meals, under 500 calories per meal, using my pantry items. Include prep time for each meal.
expected_behavior: Loop agent refinement (multiple iterations if needed)

test_cases.name: Memory and Context Retention
test_cases.description: Test agent's ability to remember previous interactions
test_cases.input: Create another meal plan for tomorrow, but make it different from the last one
expected_behavior: Recalls previous meal plan from history

test_cases.name: Error Handling - Empty Pantry
test_cases.description: Test graceful handling when pantry is insufficient
test_cases.input: Create a 5-day gourmet meal plan with exotic ingredients

test_cases.name: Tool Integration - Pantry Removal
test_cases.description: Test removing items after meal preparation
test_cases.input: Remove rice and tomatoes from my pantry since I used them
